channel.title: Adding full clanwars to 667/704 server, plz help
channel.description: Ok...i was thinking of something extra to add. Well, I just discovered that the gamers grotto works, but the clan wars safe/ dangerous and purple portal doesnt work. Any way I could add that? I know matrix v 10 has that already...
